answers.answer: At 6.8 you are pre diabetic, at least.   non diabetic should be 5.5 or less.fasting BG is the last to go bad.  meaning your BG can be going above 140 when you eat (not good) try testing 1 hour after you eat. that will give you a better idea how well your pancreas is working. (the pancreas makes insulin, insulin lowers BG)

question: My fasting blood sugar came back at 6.8. I am a 61 year old male, 5'-11" tall and weigh 206 pounds. Am I at risk for developing diabetes
title: 6.8 blood sugar
